author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it all. Part of the migration at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36404.
Besides removing the legacy type, modernized the code: 
   * merged implementation with header;
   * removed unused methods;
   * range-based loops
   * modernized event data access;

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

##### Note to reviewers, there are other modules needing to be migrated in this package, but they do require substantially more work in order to guarantee thread safety. Those will be addressed at a second time.
title: migrate `PixelVTXMonitor` to `DQMEDAnalyzer`
